page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS IN WILLINGDON
page.content: There are over forty km of roads, most of which lead to houses on estates.The A22 which links Eastbourne to the North and London carries the most traffic,we found that in the evening rush hour 2563 vehicles travelled Northbound and 2544 vehicles were Southbound.The other major road is the A27 which links Polegate to Brighton. There are forty three bus stops in the area. There is a taxi service based in our area and this charges 50 pence per mile. Polegate Railway Station connects Eastbourne, London and Brighton.307 trains stop at Polegate per week.We found that 50% of the adult inhabitants travelled to work by car,14% walked,13% bussed,7% cycled,0.8% travelled by train.
